parameters.name: CachedAsync
parameters.description: A deprecated parameter. You do not need to configure this parameter.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~610396~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ExportKey
parameters.description: A deprecated parameter. You do not need to configure this parameter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~610399~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
